description: This file contains the implementation of a JWT token generation service, specifically the TokenService class that implements ITokenService. It creates JWT tokens for user authentication by setting claims and signing the token with a symmetric key.

classes.name: TokenService
classes.description: A service responsible for creating JWT tokens for user authentication.

methods.name: CreateToken
methods.description: Generates a JWT token for the given user with claims including ID, email, display name, and name identifier.

methods.name: CreateToken
methods.description: Creates and returns a signed JWT token string for the specified user.
